title: FierceMedicalDevices' 2016 Fierce 15
author: Amirah Al Idrus
description: From video game-based therapies and a liquid biopsy for cancer to deep learning and bioelectronics, 2016's Fierce 15 are redefining what it means to be a medical device. If they're not making big bets on nascent technology, they're reimagining an existing device or therapy to deliver better results. | From video game-based therapies and a liquid biopsy for cancer to deep learning and bioelectronics, 2016's Fierce 15 are redefining what it means to be a medical device. If they're not making big bets on nascent technology, they're reimagining an existing device or therapy to deliver better results.
